attributes.action: Properly research Chlorella and Spirulina health supplements with a view to state health benefits and or risks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Spirulina and Chlorella, two types of algae and supposedly super food health supplements are fairly widely available through health stores. These products have not been properly researched to establish the health benefits (of which there are supposed to be many) and the health risks from contamination or otherwise. A national standard should be created in which these products need to adhere to, in order to ensure the public are not ingesting harmful health supplements.
